alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 12:53AM CDT until June 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding problems will continue across the warned area due to excessive runoff from earlier heavy rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of Central Kansas, including the following counties, Ellsworth and Lincoln. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of small creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1253 AM CDT, Local law enforcement reported ongoing flooding problems and some road closures across the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ellsworth, Wilson, Kanopolis, Lincoln, Sylvan Grove, Beverly, Ellsworth Airport, Westfall, Kanopolis State Park and Kanopolis Lake.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
